DOC.brief_summary: Aripiprazole will show improved effectiveness over the standard of care treatment with one of three atypical antipsychotics (olanzapine, quetiapine and risperidone).
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of schizophrenia Schizophrenia symptoms not optimally controlled or antipsychotic medication not well tolerated Diagnosis of schizoaffective disorder Patients treatmentresistant to antipsychotics
